attributes.additional_details: More money for the country if taxed. Stops the illegal selling of marijuana. Helps the economy. Can be regulated and sold in dispensarys so it can be monitored. Dozens of places all over the world have legalised it and no bad has come from it.
attributes.background: The government should legalise Marijuana since 50% of the world's medicinal marijuana is grown in the UK, you could tax it gaining a lot of money for the country which would help with the current cost of living crisis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627573
